wtomigraj

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtomigraj.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Class designated for communication with server and other users.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.net.InetAddress serverIA,
      int port,
      java.lang.String gameName)
        Constructs a client.
        Parameters:
        serverIA - address of server.
        port - port on which server listens.
        gameName - name of game we want to play.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
          throws java.net.SocketException
        Inits fields necessary for Client to work.
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - when user doesn't have right to create a socket.

      • start

        public void start(java.lang.String nick)
           throws ConnectionException
        Registers on the server with given nick.
        Parameters:
        nick - nickname which we want to use on the server.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - if we can't contact server.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes communication socket and turn to state DISC.

      • startChannel

        public void startChannel(java.lang.String chName,
                int capacity)
                  throws ConnectionException
        Sends to server request to start new channel.
        Parameters:
        chName - channel name.
        capacity - capacity of channel.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - when contacting server failed.

      • join

        public void join(java.lang.String channelName)
          throws ConnectionException
        Sends to server request to join a channel.
        Parameters:
        channelName - channel name.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - when contacting server failed.

      • refreshChannels

        public void refreshChannels()
                     throws ConnectionException
        Sends to server request to get new channels.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - when contacting server failed.

      • sendChatMssg

        public void sendChatMssg(java.lang.String mssg)
                  throws ConnectionException
        Sends chat message. If it is invoked by host then mssg is sent to all his guests, else mssg is sent to host who will propagate it to other guests.
        Parameters:
        mssg - String with message.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - when contacting another client failed.

      • sendData

        public void sendData(org.json.JSONObject json)
              throws ConnectionException
        Sends data encapsulated in json object. If method is invoked by host then json is sent to all his guests. Otherwise it sent to host.
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject with data.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - when contacting another client failed.

      • sendData

        public void sendData(org.json.JSONObject json,
            java.lang.String nick)
        Method is designated to be invoked by host. It sends a data in a form of a JSONObject to guest with given nick. If it is invoked by guest then it has no effect.
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject with data.
        nick - Nick of guest to which we are sending data.

      • leaveChannel

        public void leaveChannel()
        Informs host and server about leaving channel.

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        This method should be used by host to inform server that we want to start a game.

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        public void addPropertyChangeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener pcl)
        Adds Property Listener.
        Parameters:
        pcl - a property listener.

      • getState

        public Client.State getState()
        Returns state of client.
        Returns:
        state of client.

      • getMyNick

        public java.lang.String getMyNick()
        Returns nick of this client.
        Returns:
        nick of this client.

      • isHost

        public boolean isHost()
        Returns true if and only if this client is a host.
        Returns:

      • getGuestNicks

        public java.lang.String[] getGuestNicks()
        It should be used by host to get nicks of his guests.
        Returns:
        nicks of guests of this clients. If client is not a host or has not guests then 0-element array is returned.
